lead_paragraph: Guard Juan Carlos Navarro, whose N.B.A. rights are owned by the Washington Wizards, will be allowed by his Spanish club, F.C. Barcelona, to leave for the N.B.A. Navarro, 27, is one of the Spanish league’s best shooters from behind the 3-point line, with a 40 percent career average. In nine seasons, Navarro averaged 12.6 points a game and helped guide the club to four league titles and one European trophy.
